abstract: Creates a record zone object with the specified zone ID.
overview:
## Return Value

The custom record zone, or `nil` if CloudKit can’t create the zone.

## Discussion

Use this method when you want to create a new record zone from the information in a zone ID. After creating the zone, save it to the server using a [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKModifyRecordZonesOperation] object or the [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKDatabase/save(_:completionHandler:)-32ffr] method of [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKDatabase].

Don’t use this method to create a [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKRecordZone] object that corresponds to a zone that already exists in the database. If the zone exists, fetch it using a [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKFetchRecordZonesOperation] object or the [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKDatabase/fetch(withRecordZoneID:completionHandler:)] method of [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKDatabase].

# init(zoneID:)

**Initializer**

Creates a record zone object with the specified zone ID.

## Declaration

```swift
init(zoneID: CKRecordZone.ID)
```

## Parameters

- **zoneID**: The ID for the new zone. This parameter must not be `nil`.

## Return Value

The custom record zone, or `nil` if CloudKit can’t create the zone.

## Discussion

Use this method when you want to create a new record zone from the information in a zone ID. After creating the zone, save it to the server using a [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKModifyRecordZonesOperation] object or the [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKDatabase/save(_:completionHandler:)-32ffr] method of [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKDatabase].

Don’t use this method to create a [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKRecordZone] object that corresponds to a zone that already exists in the database. If the zone exists, fetch it using a [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKFetchRecordZonesOperation] object or the [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKDatabase/fetch(withRecordZoneID:completionHandler:)] method of [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKDatabase].

## Creating a Record Zone

- **init(zoneName:)**: Creates a record zone object with the specified zone name.
- **CKRecordZone.ID**: An object that uniquely identifies a record zone in a database.
